title: 6.21 Ping Issue
body: The past couple of days my ping has went up my exactly 30 on ONLY League of Legends, I've tried many other games (CS:GO, H1Z1, and even War Thunder) . The pings are normal on all those other games and I have no idea whats wrong with my ping on League.... I've tried many things on the support page like flushing my DNS and opening some stuff on the firewall but nothing has changed since. Please help {{item:3070}} .

Even through you're able to access other games, you can still have issues specifically connecting to the game server.  If you're still having this issue, download the [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)  and run a traceroute to 104.160.131.1 for a route on where your connection is going.

I also recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot any local network issues that might be contributing to this.  Let me know what you find!

Porocles,

This isn't a single issue. Me and a bunch of my friends have noticed about a 40-50 ping jump over the last two days as well. We all live in Edmonton, Canada and are on Shaw internet. We used to get a flat 46 ping at all times and last night we noticed it had jumped to 86 ping and stayed there - its a noticeable chance in game but its ONLY League that has changed.

Is there anything you can do on your end to figure out what may have changed to cause this?

The fact that its only League indicates that its not an ISP problem and its not a local problem.
